item.title: Bangladesh's former Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina has been sentenced to death after being found guilty of various crimes against humanity. #Bangladesh #BangladeshProtests #SheikhHasina #BBCNews

item.title: The former leader of Bangladesh, Sheikh Hasina, was not present to hear the sentence, as she has been living in exile in India since being forced from power. #Hasina #SheikhHasina #Bangladesh #Court #Tribunal #Sentencing #BBCNews
